# Data sources
1. Multilevel Monitoring of Activity and Sleep in Healthy People: https://physionet.org/content/mmash/1.0.0/
2. CAP Sleep Database: https://physionet.org/content/capslpdb/1.0.0/


```{r}
fdpath = "~/Documents/GitHub/MultilevelSleepAnalysis/data/raw/multilevel-monitoring-of-activity-and-sleep-in-healthy-people-1.0.0/DataPaper/" 
files <- list.files(path = fdpath) # 22 user folders
actigraph = list()
activity = list()
questionnaire = list()
RR = list()
saliva = list()
sleep = list()
user_info = list()
for (i in 1:length(files)) {
  f <- list.files(path = paste0(fdpath,files[i])) # data for each user
  for (fname in f){
    if ('Actigraph.csv' == fname){
      actigraph[files[i]] = read.csv(paste0(fdpath,files[i],'/',fname), header = T, sep = ",")
    }else if('Activity.csv' == fname){
      activity[files[i]] = read.csv(paste0(fdpath,files[i],'/',fname), header = T, sep = ",")
    }else if('questionnaire.csv' == fname){
      questionnaire[files[i]] = read.csv(paste0(fdpath,files[i],'/',fname), header = T, sep = ",")
    }else if('RR.csv' == fname){
      RR[files[i]] = read.csv(paste0(fdpath,files[i],'/',fname), header = T, sep = ",")
    }else if('saliva.csv' == fname){
      saliva[files[i]] = read.csv(paste0(fdpath,files[i],'/',fname), header = T, sep = ",")
    }else if('sleep.csv' == fname){
      sleep[files[i]] = read.csv(paste0(fdpath,files[i],'/',fname), header = T, sep = ",")
    }else if('user_info.csv' == fname){
      user_info[files[i]] = read.csv(paste0(fdpath,files[i],'/',fname), header = T, sep = ",")
    }else{
      next
    }
  }
}

# each folder contains
# $Actigraph.csv
# $Activity.csv
# $questionnaire.csv
# $RR.csv
# $saliva.csv
# $sleep.csv
# $user_info.csv
```
